Uses of Package
gr.forth.ics.graph.algo.transitivity

Packages that use gr.forth.ics.graph.algo.transitivity
gr.forth.ics.graph.algo.transitivity Object-oriented transitive closure and reduction algorithms. 
 

Classes in gr.forth.ics.graph.algo.transitivity used by gr.forth.ics.graph.algo.transitivity
Closure
          A closure provides the successor set for every node of some graph, i.e. all the reachable nodes from a particular node.
MutableSuccessorSet
          A mutable SuccessorSet.
PathFinder
          An object that can answer whether there exists a path from a node to another.
SuccessorSet
          Represents a set of nodes, used to model successor sets in Closure.
SuccessorSetFactory
          A factory of SuccessorSet.
Transitivity.SuccessorsListener
          Callback that can process a graph's node and its set of successors.
